message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.DS

The paper proposes a restart technique for stochastic gradient descent to improve its performance when training deep neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the experiments are conducted on image classification datasets (CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100), indicating that cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions dealing with multimodal functions, which suggests that cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with optimization techniques, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
